activities: Logik Systems Inc. produces software related to electronic discovery and document management, and provides data processing and hosting services for electronically stored information. These services are performed on behalf of both individual and corporate clients and/or their legal counsel in the process of conducting data auditing, electronic discovery, records management, and/or other related consulting services.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, United Kingdom
industrysector: Information Services - (INF)Computer Services - (CSV)Management Consulting Services - (MCS)Computer Software - (CSF)
personaldata: Company employee personal information and client-supplied data. Client-supplied data may be loaded directly to our secure platform, or may be processed (indexed and converted) upon receipt.
recoursemech: EU Data Protection Authorities for human resources data; American Arbitration Association (ICDR/AAA Safe Harbor Program) for all other data
